FuncDef: The display dhcpv6 server group command displays the configuration of a DHCPv6 server group. The display dhcpv6 server group command displays the configuration of a DHCPv6 server group. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the configuration of a specified DHCPv6 server group.
If this parameter is not specified, the configuration of all DHCPv6 server groups is displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported, and can contain only digits, letters, and special characters ('_', '-', and '.') and cannot use "-" and "--" as names.

ExtraInfo: This command applies to DHCPv6 relay devices. You can run the display dhcpv6 server group command to check the configuration of the DHCPv6 server group created on the DHCPv6 relay agent.
